roleset.name: prosper, become abundant

example.name: basic usage
example.text: Joint-research programs have proliferated as U.S. companies seek to spread the risks and costs of commercializing new superconductors and to meet the challenges posed by foreign consortia, especially in Japan.
example.arg: as U.S. companies seek to spread the risks and costs of commercializing new superconductors and to meet the challenges posed by foreign consortia, especially in Japan.

example.name: Arg0
example.text: The U.N. convened to discuss strategies to prevent the proliferation of nuclear weapons.

roleset.note: PROLIFERATE-V NOTES: For a second I misparsed 'proliferate' and thought it meant"make intoa foe of abortion". (from proliferate.01-v)
